original_text:
On the right they will devour,
    but still be hungry;
on the left they will eat,
    but not be satisfied.
Each will feed on the flesh of their own offspring:
korean_text: 오른쪽으로 움킬지라도 주리고 왼쪽으로 먹을지라도 배부르지 못하여 각각 자기 팔의 고기를 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: On the right they will devour
on the left they will eat
Each will feed on the flesh of their own offspring
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 자기 자손의 살을 먹을 것입니다
